title: Anne Bancroft
summary: Anne Bancroft (born Anna Maria Louisa Italiano; September 17, 1931 â€“ June 6, 2005)[1] was an American actress. Respected for her acting prowess and versatility, Bancroft received an Academy Award, three BAFTA Awards, two Golden Globe Awards, two Tony Awards, and two Primetime Emmy Awards.[2][3] She is one of only 24 thespians to achieve the Triple Crown of Acting.
